column3: Is that function used anywhere? The build should break if you just rename it??\n

The declaration of `CheckWork` is in `miner.h` only. It is not defined at all. See #4603 for more details. The new function `ProcessBlockFound` is used in `miner.cpp` only, and only after its definition, we do not need it there at all... I'd just delete the line.\n

ACK

The current defined function in `miner.h` (`bool CheckWork(CBlock* pblock, CWallet& wallet, CReserveKey& reservekey);`) as no implementation because it was renamed in #4603 (but header was not updated).
This PR makes totally sense.
@bitcreditscc Even better would be to completely remove the `CheckWork()` definition in the header.\nThere is no use outside of miner.cpp.\n
ok i'll do that however on my own tree i still keep getwork \n
Good catch, but I went for removal + make static instead, see 269d8ba\n
